sources.title: 1945 Fog Island La Isla De La Venganza Terry O. Morse Vose
FogIsland720p1945
sources.description: Title: Fog Island Summary: An inventor recently released from prison invites a group of former business associates to a holiday in his island home, intending to exact revenge on them. Directed by: Terry O. Morse Actors: Production Company: Producers Releasing Corporation (PRC) Release Date: 15 February 1945 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Leo, a former convict, is living in seclusion on an island with his step-daughter, the daughter of his late wife. Leo was framed by a group of former business associates, and he also suspects that one of them killed his wife. He has invited the group to his island, tempting them by hinting about a hidden fortune, and he has installed a number of traps and secret passages in his home. He is aided in his efforts by a former cell-mate who holds a grudge against the same persons. When everyone arrives, the atmosphere of mutual suspicion and the thick fog that covers the island promise a tense and hazardous weekend for everyone.

sources.title: Fog Island (1945) CRIME THRILLER
sources.description:
Stars: George Zucco, Lionel Atwill, Jerome Cowan
Director: Terry O. Morse

A man invites a select group of people to a holiday in his island home, intending to exact revenge on them!

sources.title: Fog Island (1945) Drama, Horror, Mystery | Full Length Movie
sources.description:
STARTLING...The Amazing Tale Of A Fog Swept Place Of Terror!
An inventor recently released from prison invites a group of former business associates to a holiday in his island home, intending to exact revenge on them.

Director: Terry O. Morse 
Writers: Pierre Gendron, Bernadine Angus
Stars: George Zucco, Lionel Atwill, Jerome Cowan
Genre:  Classics, Cult Film, Horror, Mystery, Drama,  Romance, Thriller

Leo was framed by a group of former business associates, and he also suspects that one of them killed his wife. He has invited the group to his island, tempting them by hinting about a hidden fortune, and he has installed a number of traps and secret passages in his home.
